events.title: Vinyl Night
events.description: Join us every Monday for an intentional listening experience. Share your favorite tunes and discover new music while enjoying house-made beer and snacks. Bring in a record from your collection and in exchange, we will play it for the pub and give you a free beer to sip on while you sit back and listen.

events.title: Music Night
events.description: In collaboration with Stir Fry Sessions, a Denver based artist collective, we showcase local talent while offering a community space to dance and mingle.

events.title: Game Night
events.description: Monday Nights from 5pm-10pm. Free Fries and Happy Hour prices for all game tables!

events.title: The Bluegrass Pick
events.description: The Bluegrass Pick is back, hosted by Max Kabat of Bowregard! Join us every Thursday from 7:30pm – 9:30pm for free live music, toe-tappin' energy, and the cozy pub vibe you already love.

events.title: Live Music
events.description: Join us every Friday night for live music at Mountain Sun Pub on Pearl Street.

events.title: Paula Gayatri & Mira Devi
events.description: Singer-songwriter Paula Gayatri delivers poetic, intimate performances dripping with soul. Early influences like Joni Mitchell, Indigo Girls, and Bach weave with her years of chanting and meditation at a yoga ashram. Her songs of personal healing and collective resilience welcome us home to the hear...

events.title: Foxes Float Trip & Magpie
events.description: Foxes Float Trip is a jammy folk-punk trio led by Carly Fox, with Rex Weston on the cello and Steve Fox on percussion, bringing the haunted farmers market vibes through Carly’s songs about hopes, dreams, ghosts, and all the middle aged things ️

events.title: Boundless in Creation: A Climatique Music & Arts Gathering
events.description: A space for BIPOC, women, and LGBTQIA+ artists to share, discuss, and uplift each other. We will showcase local artists, engage in a round-table discussion about our experiences navigating marginalization, explore collective strategies for change, and close with an open mic. Join us as we amplify th...

events.title: Mercy Club / Katie Mintle / Trouble's Braids
events.description: Boulder County's own boisterous folk rock band Mercy Club is back at the Trident! Anchored in family harmony, singable melodies and accessible, honest lyrics, Mercy Club is a dynamic folk ensemble with a rock n' roll heart.

events.description: Lively conversation for language learners, native speakers, and everyone in between. We regularly have 10+ languages spoken and always have spirited discussions!

events.title: Andy Eppler w/McCormick
events.description: Folk, soul, blues and rockin’ powerful vocals from this local singer-songwriter, Andy Eppler. Guitarist, Matt McCormick will be joining us as an opener from 5:30-6:00pm.

events.title: Jake Edmoundson
events.description: Guitars, cadillacs, and hillbilly music from this singer/songwriter based in Lyons, CO

events.title: Karaoke Night
events.description: Take the Bricks Main Stage ... you're the headliner!

events.title: Jay Stott Band
events.description: While playing the I25 corridor from Colorado to Montana for over 10 years, Lyons based Americana artist Jay Stott has been a finalist in songwriting competitions in Texas, Colorado and Montana, and performed at Rail on the River and Boulder’s Big Hootenanny this year.

events.title: The M.O.B. (Mike Ortiz Band)
events.description: The M.O.B. plays what you want to hear! From Allmans to ZZ Top with some Motown, Funk, Country and Blues tossed in.

events.title: Crick Wooder
events.description: An Owsley-Grade Grateful Dead Experience.

events.title: Open Mic Night
events.description: Music open mic, sign up at 5:30, about 15 minute time slots, often runs till 8:30 or a little later but general timeline is 6-8. Come down and eat dinner and have drinks and enjoy the music community here!

events.title: Minstrel in the Galaxy
events.description: Trio made up of Kenny Peralez, Thomas Gronberg and Dan Crecco always bring an amazing show.  Come hang out for a bit, you never know until you know!

events.title: John McKay Band
events.description: Rockin Funky Americana with originals and classic favorites.

events.title: The Delta Sonics
events.description: The Delta Sonics music takes a Chicago Blues base and seasons it with Swing, Delta, N’awlins R&B and some early Rock n' Roll . This hard -working band averages over 200 shows a year. They have been featured at many of the major festivals in Colorado.

events.title: Boogie River
events.description: Blending tight grooves, infectious energy, and a mix of rock, funk, and soul, Boogie River delivers a sound that’s both nostalgic and fresh. With each member bringing years of experience from their previous bands, the result is a powerhouse of musicianship, creativity, and pure fun.

events.title: John Bunzli: Cafe Con Leche Songs
events.description: John Bunzli is a Loveland based songwriter who has been writing a new song a week for 5 years.  To Celebrate year 5 of writing John has gathered some of the best singer/songwriters in the area and they will each perform one of his songs. It will be an evening of great playing and great singing!!

events.title: Mountain ReVerb
events.description: Tony will be SHREDDING some Tedeschi Trucks, Jimmy Hendrix, Pink Floyd, Prince and Big Head Todd solos among others. For those of you who know Tony - you know!!

events.title: Tenbucksixer
events.description: Tenbucksixer is an original band with folk-rock songs that can take you by surprise, with lyrics and tunes that are sometimes whimsical, sometimes serious, but always witty, poetic, and insightful.  they will tickle you with fun, prod you with clever, and touch you with soulful tunes.

events.title: MMB3 Organ Trio
events.description: MMB3 Organ Trio feature Ryan McCurry on Hammond Organ and vocals, John Massone on guitar and vocals, and Steve Balgooyen on drums and vocals. MMB3 plays a mix of classic funk, soul and blues—originals and creative takes on classic covers—with a New Orleans sensibility.

events.title: Wylie Jones
events.description: Wylie Jones is a multi instrumentalist one man band loop artist like the great Keller Williams, with the spirit of Toots, Bob Marley and Metallica wrapped into one.

events.title: J.J. Murphy, Wyatt Wear and Gabriel Mangione and Halle Tomlinson
events.description: An intimate evening of improvised jazz grooves and soulful vocals featuring JJ Murphy Trio and Denver's Halle Tomlinson.

events.title: The Mike Dillon Band feat. Brian Haas w/ PHOTON
events.description: A night of Funk Punk Jazz Fusion with The Mike Dillon Band and Photon

events.title: Open Mic with Steve Koppe at Roots Music Project
events.description: Roots Music Project Community Open Mic with host Steve Koppe

events.title: Cousin Curtiss: High-Voltage Blues & Roots Rock Duo w/ Derek Dames Ohl
events.description: Raw, soulful powerhouse duo ignites blues, roots rock & Americana. Don't miss this two-man sonic explosion! w/ Derek Dames Ohl

events.title: Dave Abear's A Very Jerry Band w/ Foggy Mountain Spaceship
events.description: A journey of music inspired by the Grateful Dead woven with original music by some of Colorado's best musicians!

events.title: Jeremy Mohney & his Orchestra - New Big Band Classics + Lindy Hop Lessons
events.description: Celebrate one year of Colorado's hottest swing orchestra with an unforgettable night of jazz classics and original compositions!

events.title: Workshop Series: Roots on the Road - Pro Audio and Live Sound
events.description: Roots on the Road brings professional live music production to community events, supporting local artists & training audio volunteers

events.title: Dana Kyle Stokes, Dave Boylan & Steve Koppe: Songwriters In the Round
events.description: Three legendary Colorado songwriters share stories and songs in an intimate acoustic evening celebrating 50 years of craft and community.

events.title: Back to the 2000s: Nostalgic Dance Party Fundraiser
events.description: Dance to 2000s hits while supporting young musicians through TEMPO. Every ticket helps the next generation of artists shine.

events.title: The Gentlethem’s Club: A Mystic Moonlit Cabaret
events.description: Welcome to The Gentlethem’s Club, a sensual evening  with the vintage charm of cabaret.

events.title: HOUSE of FIRE: COSMIC GLOW
events.description: GET READY TO BLAST OFF INTO ANOTHER GALAXY!

events.title: Sober Night Live! 105.5 The Colorado Sound Presents
events.description: Monthly open mic for sober creatives. Share your art, find your community, perform in a supportive space. Free admission, donations welcome.
